GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
rpmsg: qcom_smd: Fix refcount leak in qcom_smd_parse_edge

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 43e42c25a232a6862e7d2f292a069ac828559030, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 53e2822e56c7bc67e5dc19acb1e5fbb8ebff8614. For more details please see the references link.
